Class DataPaneMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataPaneMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseListener, Schedulable, TabbedPaneActivator

    public class DataPaneMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schedulable, java.awt.event.ActionListener, TabbedPaneActivator, org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseListener
    Handles taking the data from DataGrabber and plotting it with JFreeChart library.
    Author:
    Matt
